column4: arooni, I am curious if the nvidia binary or open source drivers support NVS 140m. I haven't seen good or bad things about it yet.
arooni, I'm looking into getting the T61p when it comes out with the 570M (8600 based) nvidia quadro
I don't really follow bleeding edge graphics cards. I'm usually happy with a built-in card if it work with linux :)
nod. i play games so i need that
